properties.name: text_title
properties.description: A string representing the title text (Android only).Default: "Scan QR Code"

properties.name: text_instructions
properties.description: A string representing the instruction text (Android only).Default: "Please point your camera at the QR code."

properties.name: camera
properties.description: A string defining the active camera when opening the scanner.Possible values: "front", "back"Default: "back"

properties.name: flash
properties.description: A string defining the state of the flash.Possible values: "on", "off", "auto"Default: "auto"

properties.name: drawSight
properties.description: A boolean to show or hide a line in the center of the scanner.Default: true
